posts.post_content:
Let's propose neat abilities for the vanilla creatures that get printed in each new core set. Who knows, a bored Wizards developer may happen upon one...  
  
---  
  
Bludgeon ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) *(When Bonebreaker Giant does damage to a player, you may pay ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol). If you do, Bonebreaker Giant does damage equal to its power to target creature.)*
posts.html:
Let's propose neat abilities for the vanilla creatures that get printed in each new core set. Who knows, a bored Wizards developer may happen upon one...

Bludgeon (When Bonebreaker Giant does damage to a player, you may pay . If you do, Bonebreaker Giant does damage equal to its power to target creature.)
